did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: National Auto Schools Corporation Stock Book, 1911
did.physloc: State Records Center - Archives Annex, Library of Virginia

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: National Auto Schools Corporation Stock Book, 1911. Local government records collection, Richmond Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Richmond.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Incorporated in May 1911, the National Auto Schools Corporation operated for a brief period in Richmond, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: National Auto Schools Corporation Stock Book, 1911, includes blank stock certificates and certificate stubs for purchased shares. Each stock certificate stub includes a certificate number, date, name of buyer, and the number of shares purchased.
